title: Alatzomouri Rock Shelter
description: Α small Μinoan rock shelter of uncertain function discovered alongside a highway on the modern Alatzomouri hill just west of Pacheia Ammos in Lisotho, east Crete. A significant assemblage of broken pottery and tools, all dating to EMIII, were found in the shelter.

properties.description: Rough centerpoint of excavated area determined in Google Earth after Cutler Plates 2A, 5A, and 6B.
properties.title: Imagery location of Alatzomouri Rock Shelter
